attributes.action: get rid of the appalling 2012 Olympic logo and let the British people choose a new logo.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The British people should be allowed to choose the logo for the 2012 Olympics from a shortlisted selection and not be forced to accept an appalling logo without any public consultation. The Logo will represent what is best about Britain around the world and therefore should be the best that a British person can design, chosen by the people. The BBC already has hundreds of submissions on their website and could be the organisation to arrange a shortlist and a vote.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
